## About

R tutorials for implementing target trial emulation (TTE) and causal inference methods to estimate treatment effects using observational data. These tutorials introduce important concepts in TTE and provide step-by-step instructions for deploying the procedures with examples.  

## Start here

- **All tutorials:** See the [tutorials listing](index.html)
- Or jump to: [Preparing Analysis Data by Emulating A Target Trial](TTEdemo.html)
- Or jump to: [Intention to Treat Analysis](IntentionToTreat.html)
- Or jump to: [Per-protocol Analysis](PerProtocol.html)
- Or jump to: [Doubly Robust Estimation of Average Treatment Effects](DR.html)
